channel.title: One-Page Dungeon on B3L7

item.title: Temple of the Moon Priests with Searchers of the Unknown
item.description: Note: Unless otherwise noted the images in this post are from Temple of the Moon Priests by Will Doyle and Stacey Allan under Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 (CC BY-SA 3.0 US) Last week I shared my edit of Searchers of the Unknown which I call the Searchers of the Unkown Omnibus. At the time I talked about my desire to play test the minimalist system. It seems fate saw it as a priority as well.
